keepsakes: The sword of the hero Black Mask. Useless, but looks really cool.
A big, floppy cork hat. Waterproof.
A strange pair of boots, with four wheels attached to each sole.
A jar of pungent pickled eggs, given to you by a stranger on a carriage.
A pair of cozy, woolen socks.
A bucket filled with crabs.
A goblin child: it is convinced you are its mother.
A case of costume jewelry. Worthless, but convincing from a distance.
A deck of cards with an extra ace.
A banned edition of the major holy text of the land, filled with heretical dogma and apocryphal stories.
A large hoop skirt, big enough to hide a small child in.
Bagpipes.
Black leather boots, knee high. Black leather gloves, elbow length. A riding crop. A gag.
Just two guys, ready to help you out. They’re burly, they’re brawny, they’re best friends.
A coat you stole from a disgraced magician. Full of kerchiefs, dead doves, and other miscellanea.
The signet ring of an unknown king.
A dwarven treasure dog, loyal but cowardly.
A pouch of firecrackers
A dolorous cow.
A link of 12 hard sausages.
A bottle of incredibly fine whiskey, which you clearly stole.
A 10’ spool of thin, copper wire.
A pincushion, filled with pins.
The finest ham in all the land, smoked by the man, Pitmaster Sam!
A long, strong elastic cord.
A bowling ball.
A small vial of acid. Very corrosive.
A bag of chili powder.
Needle and thread.
A wig of beautiful golden hair. Reaches down to your ankles.
A bag of beloved marbles that you won from a child.
Several small jars of bright acrylic paints.
An unnerving and upsettingly lifelike puppet.
Incredibly avant-garde and impractical clothes that no sane person would be willing to purchase.
A small bag of incredibly pungent and heady herbs. When burned, even smelling the smoke is enough too intoxicate someone.
A package, addressed to someone you don’t know, in some place you’ve never heard
A rake.
A bottle of lubricant, suitable for internal, external, and industrial use.
An extremely springy spring.
A mechanically articulated hand attached to a stick. All of the fingers can be controlled independently, though it is quite confusing to operate.
A lump of clay.
A wind-up music box.
A tube of fast-drying, industrial strength glue.
A pair of stilts.
A book of fiery, righteous political polemic.
A pair of tinted spectacles.
A very fine squash.
A vial of medicine, syrupy and sweet. Makes one quite drowsy.
A bag of flour.
A plague doctor’s mask, stuffed with fragrant herbs.
A wheel of aged Grey Matter, the mouldiest cheese in the world. Causes intense hallucinations.
A pouch of laxative powder.
A snorkel.
A worn, dog-eared copy of the novel “Lust & Larceny, the Trysts of the Amorous Elven Thief, Vol 1.” While lowbrow, the book is incredibly engrossing, and hard to pull yourself away from.
Glitter.
A jug of genuine wolf piss.
A fire-squirt.
A bottle of rat poison.
A pouch of beans.
Snake.
A few pamphlets of surprisingly convincing conspiracy theories.
A pot labelled rice pudding that is actually filled with liquid cement.
A glass case of pinned butterflies.
Two magnetic spoons.
A collapsible walking cane.
Priest’s vestments.
A game with stone pieces and a cloth board. The accompanying instruction booklet is full of poorly worded, incomprehensible, and contradictory rules.
A trio of newborn puppies.
A small glass cylinder, rounded at the tips. Quite phallic.
A sachet of dried cooking herbs.
Packets of various coloured dye powders.
A thick, heavy blanket you’ve carried with you since childhood.
A hand-bound notebook, containing six quite touching love poems. The names of the beloved in each poem have been crossed out and rewritten multiple time.
A set of clothes lined with fleece. Very warm.
A dismembered pinky finger, with a long painted red fingernail.
The flu.
A small sundial attached to a wrist strap.
A booklet of various fashionable hair, beard, and moustache styles.
A crystal monocle, also useful as a lens.
A polished, metal hand mirror.
A delicious cake, baked for you by your sweetheart.
An incredibly belligerent goose.
A four leafed clover.
A packet of saccharinely sweet lollipops.
A large bar of hard soap, floral scented.
A bag of small ceramic balls, which explode in a blinding flash of light when thrown.
A small tube of pale pink face paint.
An umbrella.
A tub of styling gel.
A rapidly decomposing fish.
A bottle of incredibly pungent perfume.
A trained messenger pigeon.
A fine-mesh net.
A pouch of itching powder.
A hand drum.
A dozen angry hornets in a jar.
A wind-up clockwork toy.
Your dad. Capable of criticizing anyone till they feel incompetent and worthless.
A jar of sweet, sticky honey.
A set of loaded dice.

grimoires.type: Silver Hand-Mirror. Reflection, mirror, prediction.
Silent Tuning Fork. Sound, music, resonance.
Chilled Iron Chain. Metal, restraint, imprisonment.
Large Odious Toad. Possession, betrayal, parasitism.
Human-skin Bound Tome. Flesh, secrets, extortion.
Infernal Contract. Oath, trust, witness.
Blank Bounty Poster. Assassination, retribution, target.
Wrought Iron Lamp. Illumination, shadow, flicker.
Decanter of Poisonous Gas. Miasma, contagion, breath.
Ebony Crystal Ball. Clairvoyance, truth, fortune.
Rainbow Crystaline Prism. Refraction, vision, geometry.
Live Ship in a Bottl. Microcosm, voyage, homecoming.
An Engraved Talisman. Sacrifice, wisdom, prophecy.
Textured Silver Disc. Return, arc, gravity.
Black Silk Blindfold. Perception, foresight, awareness.
Paper Möbius strip. Perspective, containment, curvature.
Precise Wind Chimes. Tone, air, catalyst.
Glass Sphere filled with Snow. Ice, cessation, continuation.
Dripping Candle Stump. Fire, extinguish, forbiddance.
Tarnished Bronze Cup. Water, treachery, pressure.
Ornate hand shovel. Earth, openings, weight.
Unmoving Weather Vane. Storms, navigation, flight.
Copper Lightning Rod. Lightning, conductivity, thunder.
Animated King's Skull. Undeath, oppression, hierarchy.
Worn Sack-cloth Doll. Nostalgia, haunting, denial.
Emotional Wooden Mask. Identity, disguise, personality.
Bone Planchette Board.Puzzle, solution, contradiction.
Weeping Onyx Pendant. Egocentrism, trinket, expression
Withered Dead Heart. Revival, rejuvenation, animation.
Marble Snake Eyes. Persuasion, manipulation, contempt.
Silent Music Box. Silence, melody, listening.
Life-like Marionette. Replication, subversion, belief.
Playing Card with Swimming Ink. Fluidity, doubt, cowardice.
Sack of Gossamer Wool. Slumber, consciousness, meditation.
Swirling Fractal Stopwatch. Ambiguity, confusion, hypnosis
Iron Bell and Stone Hammer. Intent, purpose, narrative.
Mysterious Old Journal. Memory, archive, history.
Wrought Gold Lotus. Threshold, passivity, motion.
Hollow Clay Cylinder. Emptiness, disparity, difference.
Kaleidoscopic Silken Veil. Void, origin, periphery.
Ceremonial Tea Set. Culture, tradition, artefact.
Heavy Iron Key-ring. Entrance, forbiddance, security.
Toy Top of Dancing Figures. Rotation, perpetuation, cycle.
Rusted Old Spectacles. Clarification, association, relativism.
Compelling Golden Ring. Heist, hold, prize.
Bloody Training Muzzle. Potential, domestication, savagery.
Chained Metal Censer. Odour, intoxication, unconsciousness.
Cruelly Thorned Whip. Torture, resilience, limit.
Falsified Chimera Trophy. Survival, adaptation, predation.
Featureless Uncanny Effigy. Representation, fortitude, vitality.
Esteemed Wooden Gavel. Authority, judgement, corruption.
Blood Soaked Rope. Escape, fate, crime.
Pristine Winged Boots. Celerity, delivery, contact.
Pouch of Pungent Herbs. Benevolence, medicine, dosage
Diary of Temptations. Record, temptation, repugnance.
Chipped Bronze Shield. Armour, protection, integrity.
Empty Tool Kit. Fortification, repair, construction.
Broken Beaded Abacus. Reduction, multiplication, calculation.
Ripped in half Autograph. Signature, disappointment, division.
Crumpled Paper Crown. Banishment, position, expulsion.
Clean Preserved Finger. Pact, willpower, malice.
Pale Bone Scalpel. Pestilence, desperation, frailty.
Broken Shard of a Murel. Completion, separation, origin.
Unfertilized Phoenix Egg. Fertility, reincarnation, gestation.
Goat-shaped Vial of Perfume. Lust, chastity, obscenity.
Wineskin made from Pig leather. Gluttony, temperance, inebriation.
Blood-Red Seal Stamp. War, provocation, injury
Reparied Porcelain Figurine. Youth, redemption, forgiveness.
Unbalanced Bone Dice. Luck, probability, gamble.
Bronze Snake Bangle. Causality, consequence, inevitability.
Portrait of your Mother. Birth, shame, guilt.
Charred Cooking Pot. Famine, cruelty, depletion.
Jade Skeletal Horse Figurine. Death, overthrow, mortality.
Blood-flecked Yellow Arrow. Hostility, recklessness, dedication.
Pillow with Snail Sigil. Sloth, diligence, rest.
Deck of well worn cards. Chance, play, serendipity.
Glittering Toad embossed Coin. Greed, charity, property.
Rough Wooden Plank. Creation, texture, destruction.
Enticing Lacey Undergarnments. Passion, diplomacy, power.
Ancient Red Brick. Architecture, support, decay.
Illuminated Writ of Recall. Learning, loss, irony.
Brittle Bird's Nest. Home, empathy, hunger.
Purring Preserved Cat's Paw. Toxin, psyche, affection.
Shard of Stained Glass. Shatter, sight, distortion.
Oddly Heavy Chisel. Leverage, rebellion, resistance.
Painted Scroll of Mountains. Exploration, discovery, alignment.
Moth-worn Burial Shroud. Ritual, compassion, community.
Slimy Stinking Ooze. Stench, slime, oozes.
Dirty Woven-grass Crown. Recognition, honour, resourcefulness.
Incorrect Screed on Flaking Parchment. Foolishness, reprisal, gender.
Sun-baked Skin of Serpent. Secrets, growth, heat.
Pouch of Powdery Grave Soil. Dirt, focus, rebirth.
Sweat-Stained Rags of a Giant. Denial, filth, depression.
Ellaborate Broken Sword. Wrath, patience, violence.
Book of Plagurized Poetry. Envy, gratitude, theft.
Tight Ornate Doublet. Pride, humility, hubris.
Yellowed Flaking Scroll. Prudence, reason, discernment.
Battered and Wellworn Wheel. Temperance, appetites, production.
Simple Ancient Club. Fortitude, courage, defence
Brilliant Copper Scales. Justice, proportionality, impartiality.

relics.type: Blade Relic: When you deal damage, you can spend favour to inflict a condition on your opponent. This condition is chosen when the relic is attuned to. The condition lasts for a number of initiative turns equal to favour spent.
Wand Relic: When a character makes a check, you can spend favour to reduce the DV of that check by an amount equal to favour spent.
Shield Relic: When you or an ally takes damage, you can spend favour to impair that damage a number of steps equal to the favour spent.
Cup Relic: You can spend favour to grant a number of allies, equal to the amount of favour spent, immunity to a condition. This immunity has a duration equal to your miracle duration.
